description.value: The complete set of concepts used for exchange of the 'sex' value as represented in international travel documents as defined by Doc 9303: Machine Readable Travel Documents, Part 7: Machine Readable Visas published by the International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO). Initially aligned with the Eighth Edition (2021).

definition.value: A value which corresponds to female ('F') has been recorded in some context.
A value which corresponds to female ('M') has been recorded in some context.A value which corresponds to 'X' (any non-M or non-F value) has been recorded or the value is unspecified.
A value which corresponds to 'X' (any non-M or non-F value) has been recorded or the value is unspecified.
